import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Edit() { // Getting data from local storage useEffect(()=>{ setsamFname(localStorage.getItem('myfname')); setsamLname(localStorage.getItem('mylname')); setsamNum(localStorage.getItem('mynumber')); setsamDob(localStorage.getItem('mydob')); setsamDept(localStorage.getItem('mydept')); },[]) const [samFname, setsamFname] = useState (''); const [samLname, setsamLname] = useState (''); const [samNum, setsamNum] = useState (''); const [samDob, setsamDob] = useState (''); const [samDept, setsamDept] = useState (''); return ( <>

setsamFname(e.target.value)} />
